verses.verse: Him that is weak <S%G770><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> you, but not to doubtful <S%G1261><s%> disputations. <S%G1253><s%>

For one <S%G3739><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> that he may eat <S%G5315><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things: another, <S%G3739><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is weak, <S%G770><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> herbs. <S%G3001><s%>

Let not him that eats <S%G2068><s%> despise <S%G1848><s%> him that eats <S%G2068><s%> not; and let not him which eats <S%G2068><s%> not judge <S%G2919><s%> him that eats: <S%G2068><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> has received <S%G4355><s%> him.

Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you that judge <S%G2919><s%> another <S%G245><s%> man's <S%G245><s%> servant? <S%G3610><s%> to his own <S%G2398><s%> master <S%G2962><s%> he stands <S%G4739><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> falls. <S%G4098><s%> Yes, <S%G235><s%> he shall be held <S%G2476><s%> up: for God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1415><s%> to make <S%G2476><s%> him stand. <S%G2476><s%>

One <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> man esteems <S%G2919><s%> one day <S%G2250><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> another <S%G3739><s%>: another esteems <S%G2919><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> alike. Let every <S%G1538><s%> man be fully <S%G4135><s%> persuaded <S%G4135><s%> in his own <S%G2398><s%> mind. <S%G3563><s%>

He that regards <S%G5426><s%> the day, <S%G2250><s%> regards <S%G5426><s%> it to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and he that regards <S%G5426><s%> not the day, <S%G2250><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> he does not regard <S%G5426><s%> it. He that eats, <S%G2068><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for he gives God <S%G2316><s%> thanks; <S%G2168><s%> and he that eats <S%G2068><s%> not, to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> he eats <S%G2068><s%> not, and gives God <S%G2316><s%> thanks. <S%G2168><s%>
For none <S%G3762><s%> of us lives <S%G2198><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> dies <S%G599><s%> to himself. <S%G1438><s%>

For whether <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> we live, <S%G2198><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and whether <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> we die, <S%G599><s%> we die <S%G599><s%> to the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> whether <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5037><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> or <S%G5037><s%> die, <S%G599><s%> we are the Lord's. <S%G2962><s%>

For to this <S%G5124><s%> end Christ <S%G5547><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> died, <S%G599><s%> and rose, <S%G450><s%> and revived, <S%G326><s%> that he might be Lord <S%G2961><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> and living. <S%G2198><s%>

But why <S%G5101><s%> do you judge <S%G2919><s%> your brother? <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you set <S%G1848><s%> at <S%G1848><s%> nothing <S%G1848><s%> your brother? <S%G80><s%> for we shall all <S%G3956><s%> stand <S%G3936><s%> before <S%G3936><s%> the judgment <S%G968><s%> seat <S%G968><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> As I live, <S%G2198><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> knee <S%G1119><s%> shall bow <S%G2578><s%> to me, and every <S%G3956><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> shall confess <S%G1843><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>
So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one of us shall give <S%G1325><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> of himself <S%G1438><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

Let us not therefore <S%G3767><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> any <S%G3371><s%> more: <S%G2001><s%> but judge <S%G2919><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> rather, <S%G3123><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> man put <S%G5087><s%> a stumbling block <S%G4348><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an occasion <S%G4625><s%> to fall <S%G4625><s%> in his brother's <S%G80><s%> way.

I know, <S%G1492><s%> and am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> by the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that there is nothing <S%G3762><s%> unclean <S%G2839><s%> of itself: <S%G1438><s%> but to him that esteems <S%G3049><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing to be unclean, <S%G2839><s%> to him it is unclean. <S%G2839><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> be grieved <S%G3076><s%> with your meat, <S%G1033><s%> now <S%G3765><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> you not charitably. <S%G2596><s%> <S%G26><s%> Destroy <S%G622><s%> not him with your meat, <S%G1033><s%> for whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died. <S%G599><s%>
Let not then <S%G3767><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G18><s%> be evil spoken <S%G987><s%> of:

For the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not meat <S%G1035><s%> and drink; <S%G4213><s%> but righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> and joy <S%G5479><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>
For he that in these <S%G5125><s%> things serves <S%G1398><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is acceptable <S%G2101><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> and approved <S%G1384><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

Let us therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> follow <S%G1377><s%> after <S%G1377><s%> the things which make for peace, <S%G1515><s%> and things with which one <S%G240><s%> may edify <S%G3619><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

For meat <S%G1033><s%> destroy <S%G2647><s%> not the work <S%G2041><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> things indeed <S%G3303><s%> are pure; <S%G2513><s%> but it is evil <S%G2556><s%> for that man <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> with offense. <S%G4348><s%>

It is good <S%G2570><s%> neither <S%G3361><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> flesh, <S%G2907><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> any <S%G3362><s%> thing whereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> stumbles, <S%G4350><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> is offended, <S%G4624><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> is made <S%G770><s%> weak. <S%G770><s%>

Have <S%G2192><s%> you faith? <S%G4102><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> it to yourself <S%G4572><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> Happy <S%G3107><s%> is he that comdemns <S%G2919><s%> not himself <S%G1438><s%> in that thing which <S%G3739><s%> he allows. <S%G1381><s%>

And he that doubts <S%G1252><s%> is damned <S%G2632><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he eat, <S%G5315><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he eats <S%G2068><s%> not of faith: <S%G4102><s%> for whatever <S%G3956><s%> is not of faith <S%G4102><s%> is sin. <S%G266><s%>
